item.title: Raised and uneven paving slabs., 13th March
item.description:
I tripped and fell on a raised paving slab on the right hand side pavement coming down Winchcombe Street towards the High Street. This occurred just a few feet up from Expert Eyebrows Salon. It really shook me up and I'm still very bruised and tender all over. Some lovely people came to my aid and one man told me his wife had tripped in the same place a couple of days ago.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Winchcombe Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Extensive damage to road edge from construction access site north, 13th March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cleeve Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury

item.title: Road redoing, 13th March
item.description:
There are many pot holes in Hartley lane it seems to me it would be better to resurface from nere seven springs roundabout up just past minitour barn just keep sending some out to fill in pot holes is a waste of time has sooner There done they need doing again with a week
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartley Lane, Coberley, Cotswold

item.title: All along A46 Road Closed signs encroach in road, 13th March
item.description:
From the Crosshands roundabout at Brockworth all the way to Painswick the many many signs indicating road closed at Pincot Lane are encroaching on the carriageway in a dangerous fashion.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Painswick Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: 10 inch pothole on junction of Haymans close and Greenhills road, 13th March
item.description:
Ay you depart Hayman,s close where it meets Greenhills road there is big pothole and it has already damaged some tyres. As you pull out onto Greenhills road directly opposite there are even more potholes. That whole area is hazardous. Previous potholes in that patch were repaired but keep on coming back suggesting the whole area needs resurfacing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Greenhills Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked on the underpass subway, 13th March
item.description:
The drain on the underpass subway that goes under the Elmbridge Court roundabout is blocked. This has regularly collected rain water and is consistently getting flooded stopping pedestrians and cycylists from using the underpass. This frequently happens now, so there must be a drain issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 13th March
item.description:
Call from Police, customer states that 2 out of 4 perm lights are not working and people are running them and is chaos.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.description:
The problem has been there for a few years exactly the same , the whole Gloucester road between St George's road and train station roundabout
